name: An extra-fishy love
description:
Entry for the Mini-Jam 91 with Quaquoum, Herrenya, and myself

An extra-fishing love

Planet earth - 2021. An alien, while casually harvesting food, encounters a problem with its ships, which will lead him to get stuck in the ocean. He eventually bonds with a little fish, who, while trying to escape predators, found a refuge in the alien's broken ship. The alien now must protect him from the hunger and the deadly teeth of the sea.

Controls

It is Highly recommended to play with the WASD keys

  • A D : moves left and right
  • Space (hold) : moves upward
  • Left click : fires the lasergun
